title: bor can't sync after [1/16 Snapshots] DONE
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `v2.28.1`

OS & Version: Docker on Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS

Commit hash : `9711af6ddf01f1eb96c9dfb7bf33c5d69e6f648a`

#### Expected behaviour
sync blocks normally

#### Actual behaviour
can't sync block, always logging `[2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=34251708 blk/second=0.000`

#### Start Command Line
```
docker run -d --name=erigon_bor \
        --restart=unless-stopped \
        --memory-swappiness=0 \
        --user root:root \
        -v $(pwd)/data:/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon \
        --network host \
        thorax/erigon:v2.28.1 erigon \
        --db.pagesize=64kb \
        --chain=bor-mainnet \
        --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall.api.matic.network \
        --snapshots=true \
        --snap.keepblocks=true \
        --torrent.download.rate=12mb \
        --torrent.upload.rate=6mb \
        --datadir=/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon \
        --port=30306 \
        --torrent.port=42070 \
        --metrics \
        --metrics.addr=10.10.17.2 \
        --metrics.port=6062 \
        --authrpc.addr=10.10.17.2 \
        --authrpc.port=8554 \
        --private.api.addr=10.10.17.2:9093 \
        --http \
        --http.compression \
        --http.port=9548 \
        --http.addr=10.10.17.2 \
        --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,erigon,bor \
        --rpc.gascap=300000000
```

#### Backtrace

mainnet archive snapshot :https://snapshot.polygon.technology/
